text: Billy Joe Maxwell (July 23, 1929 â€“ September 20, 2021) was an American professional golfer. Maxwell was born in Abilene, Texas. He won the U.S. Amateur title in 1951. Maxwell won seven times on the PGA Tour. He also played on the 1963 Ryder Cup team and was elected to the Texas Golf Hall of Fame.USGA Championship Database Maxwell died on September 20, 2021 at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American golfers Category:Sportspeople from Texas Category:People from Abilene, Texas
title: Billy Maxwell
